cta_section.title: Ready for Digital Transformation?
cta_section.description: Let's discuss how we can transform your business into a seamless digital ecosystem. Free strategy session included.

guarantee.title: Peace of Mind Included
guarantee.subtitle: We don't just promise quality — we guarantee it in writing

items.title: Full Source Code
items.description: Upon project completion, you receive complete, documented source code. Your project — your property. No vendor lock-in.

items.title: Free Bug Fixes
items.description: All bugs found after launch are fixed for free within a period specified in the contract. Details are discussed individually for each project.

items.title: Milestone Payments
items.description: Payment is split into stages linked to project milestones. You control the budget and see progress at every step.

items.title: Full Transparency
items.description: Access to task tracker, weekly reports, demos. You always know the project status and can make adjustments on the fly.

items.title: NDA & Data Protection
items.description: NDA signature, GDPR and Swiss DPA compliance. Your business information is reliably protected.

guarantee.cta_description: All guarantee terms are documented in contracts. We're open to discuss individual conditions for your project.
